thread.title: What Congress Can Learn from the Military About Cybersecurity

title: What Congress Can Learn from the Military About Cybersecurity
text:
04 What Congress Can Learn from the Military About Cybersecurity 
Nextgov: When Senators return to Washington, DC this fall, they will take up work on legislation to make it easier for companies to share cybersecurity information with each other and with the government. The future of the bill, the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act, is uncertain. Beset with concerns over privacy and civil liberties, many past attempts at addressing this issue have failed to reach the Presidentâ€™s desk.
